item.title: PCSX2 : A PS2 Emulator
item.description: Table of contents Introduction Minimum requirements Prerequisites Dumping your BIOS Download your BUIS PS2 ROM Installing PCSX2 Configuration Controller Emulation settings Graphics settings Loading your game Conclusion Sources Introduction Have you ever wanted to play some sweet classics such as “Jak X : Combat Racing” or “Ratchet and Clank” ? But your find yourself with your back against the wall because you don’t own a PS2 or find it non convenient?
